summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the acquisition by condemnation of an easement for a temporary roadway abutting the southwesterly side of Sound Way, a street provided by Ordinance No. 82293, to be used in connection with the construction of the 1st Avenue South Bridges and approaches thereto; and for the necessary temporary grades and for the right ot construct slopes for cuts and fills on the abutting property for such temporary roadway; and providing for payment from the City Street Fund.
